resources.string: Pondo\'s Magnificent Deck of Many Magical Effects
An error has occurred. Please try again.
Game Play and Role Play Effects
Use Spell Effects that modify combat
These Spell Effects can modify the stats of spells being cast (damage, range, etc) and add new effects to the battlefield.
Use Spell Effects that modify Role Play
These Spell Effects can modify Role Playing situations, but will usually not have a drastic effect in combat.
At least one type of Spell Effect must be selected.
At least one type of Target must be selected.
closest living creature to the caster

\tThis tutorial will guide you through the basic functionality of this app. You can revisit this tutorial from the Main Menu at any time if you\'d rather skip ahead and start using the app immediately.
